name: Pixel Royale
description:
PIXEL ROYALE is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.

The game was created by one person, an 18-year-old boy, help me to make the game better, advise me what you would like to see in the game in the Steam discussions and/or in the email.

I will do my best! 👍
